G

getAI(int) - Method in class World
Returns the AI at the specified index if the index is within range and the World contains at least one AI, otherwise returns null.
getDeltaX() - Method in class Edge
Computes the vertical distance between the two Vertices and returns it.
getDeltaY() - Method in class Edge
Computes the horizontal distance between the two Vertices and returns it.
getDimensions() - Method in class Sprite
Returns the size of the Sprite.
getEdge(int) - Method in class World
Returns the Edge located at the specified index if the index is not out of bounds and there is at least one Edge in the World's boundary collision collection.
getExtension(String) - Static method in class Utilities
Returns the extension from the specified file name (if any), otherwise null.
getHeight() - Method in class Entity
Returns the height of Sprite which has been assigned to the Entity.
getHeight() - Method in class Sprite
Returns the height of the Sprite.
getID() - Method in class Variable
Returns id associated with the current Variable.
getImage() - Method in class Sprite
Get the image stored inside of the current Sprite.
getIndex() - Method in class Sprite
Returns the index of the Sprite within the SpriteSheet it belongs to.
getItem(int) - Method in class World
Returns the Item at the specified index if the index is within range and the World contains at least one Item, otherwise returns null.
getName() - Method in class Sprite
Returns the name of the Sprite.
getName() - Method in class SpriteSheet
Returns the name of the current SpriteSheet.
getObject(int) - Method in class World
Returns the Object at the specified index if the index is within range and the World contains at least one Object, otherwise returns null.
getParentName() - Method in class Sprite
Returns the name of the SpriteSheet the Sprite belongs to.
getPet() - Method in class World
Returns the instance of the Pet.
getPlayer() - Method in class World
Returns the instance of the Player.
getPointA() - Method in class Edge
Returns the second Vertex of the Edge.
getPointB() - Method in class Edge
Returns the first Vertex of the Edge.
getPosition() - Method in class Entity
Returns the location of the Entity within the Level, represented as a Vertex.
getSprite() - Method in class Entity
Returns the Sprite which has been assigned to the Entity.
getSprite(String) - Method in class SpriteSheets
Returns the Sprite contained within the collection of SpritrSheets that has a matching name.
getSpriteIndex() - Method in class Entity
Returns the index of the Sprite within its originating SpriteSheet.
getSpriteSheet(int) - Method in class SpriteSheets
Returns the SpriteSheet located at the specified index.
getSpriteSheet(String) - Method in class SpriteSheets
Returns the SpriteSheet with a matching name.
getSpriteSheetIndex(String) - Method in class SpriteSheets
Returns the SpriteSheet's index with a matching name.
getTile(int) - Method in class World
Returns the Tile at the specified index if the index is within range and the World contains at least one Tile, otherwise returns null.
getType() - Method in class Entity
Returns the type of Sprite which has been assigned to the Entity.
getType() - Method in class Sprite
Returns the Sprite type.
getValidDirectory(String, String, String) - Static method in class Utilities
Returns the first valid directory or the default directory if none of the directories could be validated.
getValidFile(String, String, String) - Static method in class Utilities
Returns the first valid file name or the default file name if none of the file names could be validated.
getValue() - Method in class Variable
Returns the value assigned to the current Variable.
getValue(String) - Method in class Variables
Returns the value of a Variable matching the corresponding id if it exists in the collection of Variables, otherwise returns null.
getVertex(int) - Method in class World
Returns the Vertex located at the specified index if the index is not out of bounds and there is at least one Vertex in the World's boundary collision collection.
getWidth() - Method in class Entity
Returns the width of Sprite which has been assigned to the Entity.
getWidth() - Method in class Sprite
Returns the width of the Sprite.
getX() - Method in class Vertex
Returns the x coordinate of the Vertex.
getY() - Method in class Vertex
Returns the y coordinate of the Vertex.
Graph - Class in <Unnamed>
The Graph class represents a collection of Edges and Vertices which form a Graph.
Graph() - Constructor for class Graph
Constructs an empty Graph object.
GRID_SIZE - Static variable in class World
The size of the Grid the Level Designer supports by default.
gridSize - Variable in class World
The size of the Grid in the current World.
